description.text: this message file contains message for common dialog

msg.text: [$$s] does not fall within the range of alphanumeric [a-z, A-Z, 0-9] and underscore. It is not acceptable.
[$$s] conflicts with existing another [Dest. column name]. It is not acceptable.
[$$s] conflicts with existing build-in column. It is not acceptable.
Anchor site is invalid.
Column is out of range $$s to $$s.
Row is out of range $$s to $$s.
Region is empty.
Width is out of range $$s to $$s.
Height is out of range $$s to $$s.
The UGroup name specified already exists.
Please input a valid UGroup name.
Element [$$s] has been assigned to UGroup [$$s].\n
UgroupDlg::moveItem() parameter error.
Width is invalid. The region is out of range.
Height is invalid. The region is out of range.
The Region name specified already exists.
Please input a valid Region name.
Dialog is not ready.
[$$s] conflicts with existing build-in column. It is not acceptable.

The LFE3-17EA, in a 484 package, may have a DQS grouping migration issue that requires design changes if DQS-DQ associations are used in the design. Refer to the LatticeECP3 data sheet and the LatticeECP3 pinout files for the specific devices to check for DQS grouping mismatches.
Please input file name.
Unable to open output file.
Field [$$s] is required.
Nothing was selected to backannotate. To backannotate, make a selection.
PIO DRC has found errors. Do you want to continue saving the LPF file?

Logical PIO DRC tests validated:
- I/O placement such as signal standard and VCCIO combinations bank-by-bank
- VREF requirements
- Potential conflicts with user-assignments to multi-function pins like those of the sysCONFIG interface
PIO Design Rule Check: No errors or warnings detected.
PIO Design Rule Check: There are errors or warnings detected. See the output window for details.
PIO DRC passed successfully.\n
PIO DRC failed with errors or warnings.\n
Please view the PIO DRC report through the Report view for details.
This operation will release the element [$$s] from UGroup [$$s]. Continue or not?
Please select elements.
Do you want to save your in-memory $$s changes into $$s?
